SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
The Action enum represents different actions that can be performed.
Bird
The Bird class implements the PersonalityStrategy interface and provides behavior adjustment for a pet based on its social level.
Cat
The Cat class implements the PersonalityStrategy interface and supports object serialization by implementing Serializable.
Dog
The Dog class implements the PersonalityStrategy interface and supports object serialization by implementing Serializable.
Food
Represents a food item that can be consumed by a pet.
Gift
Represents a gift item that can be given to a pet.
InstructionsPage
A class representing the Instructions Page of the Pixel Pets game.
Inventory
Represents an inventory system that manages a collection of items.
Item
Abstract base class representing an item that can be used on a pet.
Juice
The Juice class represents a juice consumable that extends the Food class.
MainMenu
Represents the main menu of the PixelPets game application.
Meat
The Meat class represents a type of food that can be given to pets.
Mood
Represents different emotional states or moods.
MusicPlayer
A singleton class that manages audio playback functionality for the application.
ParentalControlsDialog
A dialog window that provides parental control functionalities for the virtual pet game.
PersonalityStrategy
Defines a strategy for adjusting pet personality behaviors.
Pet
Represents a virtual pet with various attributes and behaviors.
PetController
Controller class that manages interactions between the Pet model and PetView.
PetGame
Main class that initializes and runs the Pet Game application.
PetModel
The PetModel interface represents a virtual pet with various attributes and actions.
PetSelectionDialog
A dialog window for selecting a virtual pet in the game.
PetSimulation
A simulation class that demonstrates the functionality of a virtual pet.
PetView
The PetView class provides the graphical user interface (GUI) for interacting with a virtual pet in the Pixel Pets game.
Settings
A class that manages game settings through a properties file.
TimeSimulator
A class that simulates the passage of time and updates pet attributes periodically.
Vegetables
Represents a Vegetables food item that can be fed to pets.
